We may not be able to obtain a loan from the bank. To overcome this problem, we can seek private investors who may be willing to fund our idea.
We may face unexpected costs related to unforeseen expenses. To overcome this problem we can establish a separate budget for costs which are unexpected.
We might face issues related to the employees. To overcome this problem, we can hire an experienced human resources professional to handle personnel issues in the future.
There might be issues with management. To avoid this problem, we can ensure that the owner hires competent managers.

There might be issues with the location. To avoid this problem, we can ensure that we pick a central location. A central location will draw more customers, and help us build a name for ourselves in the hotel industry with the increased patronage.
